SEC Filing Summary: Revenue Breakdown

The following table summarizes segment revenue for fiscal year 2025:

SegmentRevenue (Millions)YoY Growth
Cloud Services$8,500+35%
Enterprise Software$4,200+12%
Hardware$2,100-5%
Professional Services$1,800+8%

Total revenue was $16.6 billion for fiscal year 2025, up 18% from $14.1 billion in fiscal year 2024.

Cloud Services represented 51.2% of total revenue, up from 44.7% in the prior year, reflecting the company's successful transition to cloud-based offerings.

The company's gross margin was 72.4%, compared to 69.8% in fiscal year 2024, driven primarily by the higher-margin Cloud Services segment.
